message = " A scientist stares at his machines and rubs his hands together greedily. Electricity waves back and forth on poles and lights blink on and off.
'Yes, it's almost complete,' he says to himself. His eyes move across everything and stops at a cage at the end of his machines. 'I just need one more item.'
'Master, look here,' a machine calls from the other side of the room. The scientist goes to the machine and looks into the screen.
It shows two apes that are walking down a path to a nearby river. 'Yes,' the scientist hisses. 'It will do wonderfully.'
He pushes a button on the machine and a target appears over the apes on the screen. He pushes another button and a beam of reddish orange light streaks toward the two apes.
